name: NSPoint
desc: A point in a Cartesian coordinate system.

items.name: func NSEqualPoints(NSPoint, NSPoint) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two points are equal.

items.name: func NSMakePoint(CGFloat, CGFloat) -> NSPoint
items.desc: Creates a new NSPoint from the specified values.

items.name: func NSPointFromString(String) -> NSPoint
items.desc: Returns a point from a text-based representation.

items.name: func NSStringFromPoint(NSPoint) -> String
items.desc: Returns a string representation of a point.

items.name: func NSPointFromCGPoint(CGPoint) -> NSPoint
items.desc: Returns an NSPoint typecast from a CGPoint.

items.name: func NSPointToCGPoint(NSPoint) -> CGPoint
items.desc: Returns a CGPoint typecast from an NSPoint.

items.name: let NSZeroPoint: NSPoint
items.desc: An NSPoint structure with both x and y coordinates set to 0.

items.name: typealias NSPointArray
items.desc: Type indicating a parameter is array of NSPoint structures.

items.name: typealias NSPointPointer
items.desc: Type indicating a parameter is a pointer to an NSPoint structure.
